Factsheet

Developer:
Soweli Digital Studios
Based in London
Release date:
2025
Platforms:
Steam
Website:
crunda.com
Regular Price:
TBD

Description

Leap, dive and slam your way across the asteroid belt in this unique physics speedrunning platformer. Explore the mysteries of Crunda's wobbly whimsical world or challenge your friends to tackle the world record table!

History

Crunda started life as an entry to the 48-hour game development competition Ludum Dare in 2021. The competition is judged by other entries and Crunda was placed first for fun and finished overall in the top three. After sitting neglected for several years, development was restarted in 2024 with a full proof of concept and demo. We are now looking for a publisher to help drive the game to a successful release.

Features

  • Wobbly physics platformer - Fight against gravity and launch yourself between worlds modeled with a bespoke set of physics.
  • Explore the mysteries of the whimsical world - Uncover the stories of the motley bunch of characters inhabiting this microgravity backwater.
  • Tackle the world record table - Hunt gold medals on levels or attempt world record table. Spectate the ghosts of record runs and improve on their strategies!
